articles.title: UK clears Amazon's $1.7 billion deal for Roomba-maker iRobot - Reuters
articles.description: Britain's competition regulator on Friday cleared Amazon.com Inc's (AMZN.O) planned $1.7 billion acquisition of iRobot Corp
articles.content:
June 16 (Reuters) - Britain's competition regulator on Friday cleared Amazon.com Inc's (AMZN.O) planned $1.7 billion acquisition of iRobot Corp (IRBT.O), maker of the Roomba vacuum cleaner.

articles.content:
Apple today opened its new store in Battersea, South West London the second to feature the company's overhauled retail store design after the Tysons Corner revamp last month.

articles.author: Sarah Palmer
articles.title: What’s happening with Reddit? Website blackout continues for ‘indefinite’ amount of time - Euronews
articles.description: A two-day Reddit protest is set to continue indefinitely, with the website’s volunteer moderators saying they will maintain the social media site’s blackout unless its owners back down over new user fees.
